alert.note: Alert for Central Ventura County Valleys; Ojai Valley; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Ventura County Inland Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 13 at 12:11PM PST until February 14 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 10 PM PST TUESDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 30 possible. * WHERE...Ventura County Inland Coast, Ojai Valley, Central Ventura County Valleys and Southeastern Ventura County Valleys. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 10 AM to 10 PM PST Tuesday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Tuesday night through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.

area.areaDesc: Central Ventura County Valleys; Ojai Valley; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Ventura County Inland Coast
